body: At 9th level, as a swift action, a cad may alter the type of damage dealt by an improvised weapon to bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage. In addition, the cad has a critical threat range of 19–20/×2 with any improvised melee weapon. This ability replaces weapon training 2.
name: Razor-Sharp Chair Leg
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Combat/Rules/Class Archetypes/Fighter/Fighter Archetypes/Cad/Razor-Sharp Chair Leg
